transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello, good afternoon sir.
Customer: Good afternoon. Ji, Bharat Industries mein baat ho rahi hai.
Executive: Haan madam. Haan ji sir, aapki main call gayi thi. Service se related koi issue aa raha hai sir?
Customer: Madam, isme hum dekhte hain 10,000 se neeche ki call aa rahi hai humare ko. Lead dikha raha hai 10,000 se upar ki nahi dikha raha.
Executive: Uh, fresh leads nahi dikha raha hai?
Customer: Nahi, 10,000 se upar ki nahi dikha raha.
Executive: Achcha achcha, order value kam aa rahi hai. Haan?
Executive: Kam order value ki lead show kar raha hai. Haan ji, main bol rahi thi, kam order value ki lead show kar raha hai sir?
Customer: Haan, upar ki karte hain, us par click karte hain, 10,000 se upar ki kehte hain not applicable.
Executive: Achcha achcha, main batati hu, woh kyun hota hai. Not applicable tab aa jata hai jab koi lead aayi hai aur woh lead humse pehle kisi dusre customer ne, kisi dusre customer ne consume kar li. Haan, aayi toh sahi pehle.
Executive: Nahi, woh aapke aane se pehle, jaise hi woh post hui, within a minute kisi dusre client ne usko purchase kar liya, usko consume kar liya. Aur aap jab us pe click karoge toh woh aapko dikhayegi not available. Toh 10,000 se kam wali kyun dikhai de rahi hai toh?
Executive: Haan ji, aap mujhe uski photo bhej doge sir?
Customer: Photo bhejo.
Executive: Haan, aap mujhe uski photo bhej do.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving buyleads above 10,000.



Resolution:

- Explained reason for 'not applicable' message.

- Asked customer to share a screenshot.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send a screenshot.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, order value, not applicable
